Guatemala - Asistencia de Emergencia
            para Servicios Sociales

abstracts.cdata!:
The objective of the Emergency Support
            for Social Services Project is to preserve health and
            education services following severe flooding and other
            natural disasters that took place in Guatemala between May
            and September 2010. The most relevant environmental issue
            resulting from the implementation of this project is the
            production of Hospital Solid Waste (HSW). Now the every
            hospital and facility in the public health network is aware
            and familiar with the regulatory framework and the standards
            and practices to manage HSW properly. The general
            comptroller conducted an environmental audit in the 43
            public hospitals, to encourage compliance with the HSW and
            waste water management regulations.
